publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2312 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau:Rule 2.3.1—That the Parliament agrees the following dates in terms of Rule 2.3.1: 8 – 23 October 2005 (inclusive), 24 December 2005 – 8 January 2006 (inclusive), 11 – 19 February 2006 (inclusive), 1 – 17 April 2006 (inclusive), 1 July – 3 September 2006 (inclusive). Supported by: Tavish Scott*
